item.title: 【Bugs!】KATSEYE - Debut (Bugs! 4K)
item.description:
Hi, just wanted to let you know that all the albums have been converted from FLAC to ALAC
And I also wanted to credit the post where I got the Back To Black tracks from:
https://sharemania.us/threads/amy-winehouse-back-to-black-era.235689/
Well, now on to the Content

Frank Era:



Album: Frank (Deluxe Edition)
Release: 05-09-2008
Label: Island Records

Tracks:

Disc One
01 - Intro / Stronger Than Me
02 - You Sent Me Flying / Cherry
03 - Know You Now
04 - Fuck Me Pumps
05 - I Heard Love Is Blind
06 - Moody's Mood For Love / Teo Licks
07 - (There Is) No Greater Love
08 - In My Bed
09 - Take The Box
10 - October Song
11 - What Is It About Men
12 - Help Yourself
13 - Amy Amy Amy
14 - Outro
15 - Brother​
16 - Mr Magic (Through The Smoke)

Disc Two
01 - Take The Box (Original Demo)
02 - I Heard Love Is Blind (Original Demo)
03 - Someone To Watch Over Me (Original Demo)
04 - What It Is (Original Demo)
05 - Teach Me Tonight (Hootenanny)
06 - 'Round Midnight
07 - Fool's Gold
08 - Stronger Than Me (Later with Jools Holland)
09 - I Heard Love Is Blind (Live at The Concorde, Brighton)
10 - Take The Box (Live at The Concorde, Brighton)
11 - In My Bed (Live at The Concorde, Brighton)
12 - Mr. Magic (Through The Smoke) [Janice Long Session]
13 - (There is) No Greater Love (Janice Long Session)

item.title: 【Albums (lossy)】Dolby Atmos - Raveena - Where the Butterflies Go in the Rain (2024) [Dolby Atmos 5.1 48kHz 16/JOC]
item.description:
​
Code:
General
Format                                   : MPEG-4
Format profile                           : Apple audio with iTunes info
Codec ID                                 : M4A  (M4A /isom/iso2)
File size                                : 45.4 MiB
Duration                                 : 3 min 33 s
Overall bit rate mode                    : Variable
Overall bit rate                         : 1 785 kb/s
Album                                    : Where the Butterflies Go in the Rain
Album/Performer                          : Raveena
Part/Position                            : 1
Track name                               : Pluto
Track name/Position                      : 1
Performer                                : Raveena
Composer                                 : Tyler Cole, Raveena Aurora, Ajay Bhattacharyya & Aaron Liao
Genre                                    : R&B/soul
Recorded date                            : 2024-05-08
Encoded date                             : 2024-06-12 16:57:34 UTC
Tagged date                              : 2024-06-12 16:57:34 UTC
Copyright                                : ℗ 2024 Moonstone Recordings, LLC / EMPIRE
Cover                                    : Yes
Lyrics                                   : [00:15.74]Trying not to cry / [00:17.74]It's been a few years since we had to say goodbye / [00:22.74]But you reappear as a butterfly / [00:27.49]It's not like Earth side's better / [00:30.31]But some days I wish you were here / [00:35.95]Some days the sun hits perfect on my face / [00:40.42]And some days, it's hit and runs and city hellscapes / [00:45.24]We took a day to remember / [00:48.07]How I wish you could see twenty-eight / [00:56.84]Pushing 80 in a blue Camaro / [01:01.92]New love got my mind up in Pluto / [01:06.88]Watching smoke turn into clouds from the back seat / [01:11.90]I pray this good thing don't run away from me / [01:16.96]Ah / [01:21.08]Where'd ya go, where'd ya go, where'd ya go, where'd ya go, where'd ya go? / [01:27.06]Ah / [01:27.13]I pray this good thing don't run away from me / [01:31.19]Where'd ya go, where'd ya go, where'd ya go, where'd ya go, where'd ya go? / [01:32.17]I pray this good thing don't run away from me / [01:37.24]Some weeks before you left, you asked, "Where do butterflies go in the rain?" / [01:41.72]I don't need proof that angels exist / [01:46.13]You showed me how nature is the proof of bliss / [01:51.22]But I keep repeating the same old mistakes / [01:56.29]It's an animal habit I may never break / [02:01.18]So I'm pushing 80 in a blue Camaro / [02:07.56]New love got my mind up in Pluto / [02:12.53]Watching smoke turn into clouds from the back seat / [02:17.62]I pray this good thing don't run away from me / [02:22.69]Ah / [02:26.79]Where'd ya go, where'd ya go, where'd ya go, where'd ya go, where'd ya go? / [02:32.79]Ah / [02:32.79]I pray this good thing don't run away from me / [02:36.86]Where'd ya go, where'd ya go, where'd ya go, where'd ya go, where'd ya go? / [02:37.88]I pray this good thing don't run away from me / [02:53.05]I know you're not so far from me / [02:58.05]I saw you ten times in a dream / [03:03.15]I know you're not so far from me / [03:08.23]I saw you ten times in a dream / [03:13.21]Pushing 80 in a blue Camaro / [03:18.29]New love got my mind up in Pluto / [03:23.29]Watching smoke turn into clouds from the back seat / [03:28.38]I pray this good thing don't run away from me

Audio
ID                                       : 2
Format                                   : ALAC
